Name: Epic Adventures: Cursed Onboard
About the game: The sequel of Epic Adventures, 'Epic Adventures: Cursed Onboard' takes you to a derelict ship stranded in the middle of the Great Amazon jungle. The recently discovered ship set sail in the 1970s but it never reached its destination. There were no survivors and the fate of the whole crew still remains a mystery. With the help of the ghost of a little girl named Anna, you will search the ship in detail and uncover a story that is astonishing as well as tragic! Dive into this incredible hidden object adventure game! Also Buy Part 1 'epic Adventures: La Jangada'
